name: Shirley Murdock
description: '''Shirley Murdock''' (born May 22, 1957) is an American [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]] singer-songwriter. She is best known for her guest appearance alongside [[Charlie Wilson (singer)|Charlie Wilson]] on [[Zapp and Roger]]'s 1986 single "[[Computer Love (Zapp song)|Computer Love]]", as well as her 1986 single, "As We Lay". The latter peaked at number 23 on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] and spawned from her [[Shirley Murdock!|self-titled debut album]] (1986), released by [[Elektra Records]].
